    • Method Detail

      • getRoundingMode

        public static java.math.RoundingMode getRoundingMode(IEntityType type)
        Gets the rounding mode that should be used when converting amounts between transaction, reserving, claim, and reporting currency for the specified Transaction or RITransaction type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the Transaction or RITransaction for which to get the rounding mode
        Returns:
        the rounding mode to be used when converting the amounts for the specified type

      • getCurrencyFormatExpressionForRender

        public static java.lang.String getCurrencyFormatExpressionForRender(Currency currency)
        A format string to be used with java.text.DecimalFormat and meant to format a number for output display. i.e. read-only mode, not edit mode.

        Only use with Pebbles "format" attributes that take such a format string. Otherwise use CurrencyUtil.renderAsCurrency()

        Parameters:
        currency - adds the Currency symbols for this currency before and after the number.
        Returns:
        a format string used with java.text.NumberFormat and its subclasses
        See Also:
        DecimalFormat, CurrencyUtil.getCurrencyFormatExpression(typekey.Currency)

      • get

        public static CurrencyAmount get(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                 Currency currency)
        Wraps a BigDecimal in a CurrencyAmount. No attempt is made to scale the value to the appropriate scale.
        Returns:
        null if the given amount is null; otherwise, a CurrencyAmount whose amount is equal to the given amount and currency

      • get

        public static CurrencyAmount get(double amount,
                                 Currency currency)
        Wraps a BigDecimal in a CurrencyAmount. No attempt is made to scale the value to the appropriate scale.
        Returns:
        null if the given amount is null; otherwise, a CurrencyAmount whose amount is equal to the given amount and currency

      • getStrict

        public static CurrencyAmount getStrict(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                       Currency currency)
        Constructs a CurrencyAmount from a BigDecimal amount and currency. The amount will be scaled as appropriate for the given currency, and the amount must not have more decimal digits than that scale allows. Use CurrencyUtil.roundToCurrencyScale(java.math.BigDecimal, typekey.Currency, java.math.RoundingMode) in preference to this method if rounding is required when scaling the BigDecimal. For example, if it is the result of a divide or multiply operation.
        Returns:
        null if the amount is null, otherwise a new CurrencyAmount instance with the given amount and currency.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - if the given amount cannot be scaled without rounding.
